solution_line_template: Knowing Kevin's record of eating 70 wings in 8 minutes or {kevin_wings} / {kevin_minutes} = {kevin_rate} wings in a minute
Alan must increase his ability to eat {alan_current_rate} wings per minute to {kevin_rate} - {alan_current_rate} = {rate_to_equal} wings per minute to equal Kevin's world record.
To beat Kevin, Alan must eat {rate_to_equal}+{increment_to_beat} = <<{rate_to_equal}+{increment_to_beat}={rate_to_beat}>>{rate_to_beat} hot wings per minute.
